parameters.name: CheckId
parameters.description: The ID of the check item.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The instance IDs of cloud services.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: RegionIdKey
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: SortTypes
parameters.description: The types of the conditions based on which the check items are sorted.
